wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I often visit your site and have noticed that you don't update it often. More frequent updates will give your website higher rank & authority in google. I know that writing posts takes a lot of time, but you can always help yourself with miftolo's tools which will shorten the time of creating an article to a few seconds.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: phantom
item.content:encoded: This is an example of a WordPress page, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where you are coming from. You can create as many pages like this one or sub-pages as you like and manage all of your content inside of WordPress.
